q: Former US secretary of defense Donald Rumsfeld describes the US government's handling of the events in Andijan, Uzbekistan, in 2005, as one of the most unfortunate, if unnoticed, foreign policy mistakes of our administration because it supposedly drove Uzbekistan into the arms of Russia. In his new memoirs, Known and Unknown, Donald Rumsfeld offers a detailed account of his dealings with Uzbekistan, including his views on the diplomatic crisis

, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.'' In a posting on his blog Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in 70 broken objects, all of which can be restored. `` I want people to know that after nine days of protests, the monuments are safe,'' Zahi Hawass said.`` If anything happens, I will announce it.'' When you play this game, it's all about the people that come to see you, the people in the stands. For somebody to say the fans don't mean anything, that's crazy. Since joining the team in early December, Allen Iverson has helped the 76ers go 10-13 after a 5-15 start.
